DESCRIPTION: Take a role to another member.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}take [@User | User ID] [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]** ~ Take the role from the user.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: Note: The bot must have a role higher than the role you are trying to take.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: Note: You must have a role higher than the role you are trying to take.
USAGE: {{prefix}}take [@User | User ID] [@Role | Role ID | Role Name]
ALIASES: Take does not have any aliases.
MISSING_MANAGE_ROLES: In order to take a role from a user I need to have the **Manage Roles** permission.
NEED_USER: You did not provide a user to whom to take a role from.
NEED_ROLE: You did not provide a role to take.
BOT_TOO_LOW: The bot's highest role is too low to take this role.
USER_TOO_LOW: You're highest role is too low to take this role.
SUCCESS: The **{{role}}** role has been taken from **{{user}}**.
GIVEN_BY: {{user}} used the take command to take the role from this user.
